title: Ancient History Sample
description: A sample assessment demonstrating the explanation feature

questions.question: Who was the first Roman Emperor?
questions.explanation: Augustus (originally Octavian) became the first Roman Emperor in 27 BCE after defeating Mark Antony and establishing the Roman Empire.

questions.question: What year did the Western Roman Empire fall?
questions.explanation: The Western Roman Empire fell in 476 CE when the Germanic chieftain Odoacer deposed the last Roman emperor, Romulus Augustulus.
